name: Dumb Ways To Scare:Think Outside The Box
name_original: Dumb Ways To Scare:Think Outside The Box
description:
Remember last year the popular “100 WAYS TO DIE” :P
This year the dumb monster decides that he would seek revenge. He doesn’t want to die like 100 times but he chooses to make us suffer.

GOAL:
The goal is pretty simple: find various ways to help the dumb monster scare people.

GAMEPLAY:
* If the people are hidden, make sure you expose them.
* If there is no path, make sure you create one for the dumb monster.
* If there are obstacles, make sure you clear them out.
* Tap, swipe, tilt, shake, shout……do everything you can think of with your device to make things possible.
* Stuck? Use hints or tutorials to help you walk through.
* Get coins for each level you succeed and spend them to purchase the help.
* Don’t be ashamed if you find yourself stuck, ask friends!

GOTTA TELL YOU:
If you really feel sorry about the innocent people, just stop playing. But we can assure you that you just can’t stop playing once you start. So just keep it that way, and scare the hell out of people. Who knows how many dumb ways there can be to scare the people.
